description: This file defines the root layout and configuration for a Remix-based React application, including links to stylesheets, meta tags, and the main app component rendering outlet children.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external resource links such as stylesheets and fonts.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component providing the HTML scaffold and including Meta, Links, ScrollRestoration, and Scripts.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main application component rendering the Outlet for nested routes.
